item.title: GitHub - git-truck/git-truck: Git repository visualizations, cumulative con
item.description: Git Truck is a tool that provides you with a truckload of visualizations of your git repository. You can read more about the features in the feature overview, in papers about Git Truck, or just try it and start exploring your projects!

item.title: 2025年春開始の新作アニメ一覧 - GIGAZINE
Git without a forge
item.description: I’ve written quite a lot of free software in my life. Most of it was from scratch: projects I started myself. So I get to choose where to host them – or rather, I have to choose where to host them. These days, all my projects are held in Git.
